name: Large room in Boston, private bath and free bfast
neighborhood_overview: Great neighborhood! Whole Foods, CVS, 7/11, and lots of restaurants around. Close to Jamaica Pond and the Arnold Arboretum.
description:
We offer a large room in our bed and breakfast with free breakfast, and complimentary coffee, tea, granola bars, fruit, and baked goods all day.

The space
The Perkins Inn is a quaint bed and breakfast located in Hyde Square, Jamaica Plain, Boston, MA. This is a beautiful 120 year old Victorian home decorated authentically with a helpful host living on site.

Guest access
Guests can access the whole house including common rooms, shared kitchens, 3 shared bathrooms and parking.

Other things to note
We receive many international guests who congregate together in our lovely house, creating a social atmosphere with enjoyable conversation over communal meals in our dining room.

License number
STR-410133
